languages.text: "Я бы не раскрыла сию тайну чужаку, но вы, {name}... уже не раз меня выручали". {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза и касается нагрудника в области сердца.{/n} "Атлас Звездных Путей есть священный артефакт Дома Орселлио — он помогает нашим навигаторам прокладывать маршруты сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}. Сколько я себя помню, кристалл... то есть Атлас... всегда был во мне. Придавал мне сил. Но другие... Я заметила, как предателей во дворце душили пепельные призраки отчаяния, когда мы встретились лицом к лицу. Могу поклясться, призраки тянулись к их собственным Атласам".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы не раскрыла сию тайну чужаку, но вы, {name}... уже не раз меня выручали". {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза и касается нагрудника в области сердца.{/n} "Атлас Звездных Путей есть священный артефакт Дома Орселлио — он помогает нашим Навигаторам прокладывать маршруты сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}. Сколько я себя помню, кристалл... то есть Атлас... всегда был во мне. Придавал мне сил. Но другие... Я заметила, как предателей во дворце душили пепельные призраки отчаяния, когда мы встретились лицом к лицу. Могу поклясться, призраки тянулись к их собственным Атласам".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."
languages.original_text: "Я бы не раскрыла сию тайну чужаку, но вы, {name}... уже не раз меня выручали". {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза и касается нагрудника в области сердца.{/n} "Атлас Звездных Путей есть священный артефакт Дома Орселлио — он помогает нашим навигаторам прокладывать маршруты сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}. Сколько я себя помню, кристалл... то есть Атлас... всегда был во мне. Придавал мне сил. Но другие... Я заметила, как предателей во дворце душили пепельные призраки отчаяния, когда мы встретились лицом к лицу. Могу поклясться, призраки тянулись к их собственным Атласам".

It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: "It is a sacred artifact of House Arsellio, the Starway Atlas. It helps the House navigators to chart the course through the Warp. The crystal was at my side for as long as I can remember, empowering me. But the others... I noticed the renegades at the station were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: "It is a sacred artifact of House Orsellio, the Starway Atlas. It helps the House's Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal has been with me, giving me strength, for as long as I can remember. But the others... I noticed the renegades on the station were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. traits.locale_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我绝不会对外人透露这个秘密，可你，{name}……你不止一次地帮过我。”{n}卡西娅垂下头，抚摸着心口处的盘状物体。{/n}“群星圣仪是奥赛罗家族神圣的造物。它可以帮助我们导航者制定穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的航线。这块水晶……我是说，群星圣仪……从我记事起，它就一直在我体内，赐予我力量。可其他的圣仪……当我在宫殿里面对那些叛徒时，他们被充满绝望的灰色幽灵扼住，窒息而死。我敢发誓，那群幽灵当时扼住的就是他们的圣仪。”
languages.original_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: “我绝不会对外人透露这个秘密，可你，{name}……你不止一次地帮过我。”{n}卡西娅垂下头，抚摸着心口处的盘状物体。{/n}“群星圣仪是奥塞罗家族神圣的造物。它可以帮助我们导航者制定穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的航线。这块水晶……我是说，群星圣仪……从我记事起，它就一直在我体内，赐予我力量。可其他的圣仪……当我在宫殿里面对那些叛徒时，他们被充满绝望的灰色幽灵扼住，窒息而死。我敢发誓，那群幽灵当时扼住的就是他们的圣仪。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, ... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the warp. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

languages.text: «Nunca revelaría esto a un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}, pero... {name}, ya ha acudido en mi ayuda numerosas veces». {n}Cassia pestañea y se lleva la mano a la placa que cubre su corazón.{/n} «El Atlas de las Vías Estelares es un artefacto sagrado de la casa Orsellio. Ayuda a nuestros Navegantes a trazar un rumbo por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Este cristal... digo el Atlas... lleva en mi interior desde que recuerdo, dándome fuerzas. Pero los otros... Me fijé en que los renegados del palacio estaban asfixiados por los fantasmas cinéreos de la desesperación cuando nos vimos cara a cara. Y juraría que los fantasmas intentaban tocarse el Atlas».
languages.original_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca revelaría esto a un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}, pero... {name}, ya ha acudido en mi ayuda numerosas veces». {n}Cassia pestañea y se lleva la mano a la placa que cubre su corazón.{/n} «El Atlas de las Vías Estelares es un artefacto sagrado de la casa Orsellio. Ayuda a nuestros Navegantes a trazar un rumbo por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Este cristal... digo el Atlas... lleva en mi interior desde que recuerdo, dándome fuerzas. Pero los otros... Me fijé en que los renegados del palacio estaban asfixiados por los fantasmas cinéreos de la desesperación cuando nos vimos cara a cara. Y juraría que los fantasmas intentaban tocarse el Atlas».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私はこの秘密を部外者には決して明かしませんでした、ですが{name}、あなたは…あなたはもう何度も私を助けに来てくれました」{n}カシアはまつげを下げ、心臓の上を覆う胸当てに手を触れる。{/n}「スターウェイ・アトラスはオーセリオ家の神聖なアーティファクトです。航宙士が{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}を航海するうえで、航路を導くのに役立つのです。このクリスタル…つまりアトラスは…私が覚えている限りずっと私の中にあって、私に力を与えてくれました。ですが他のものは…宮殿にいた反逆者たちは絶望の灰の亡霊に息をつまらせていました。亡霊たちは、間違いなく彼らのアトラスに手を伸ばしていたのです」
languages.original_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの秘密を部外者には決して明かしませんでした、ですが{name}、あなたは…あなたはもう何度も私を助けに来てくれました」{n}カシアはまつげを下げ、心臓の上を覆う胸当てに手を触れる。{/n}「スターウェイ・アトラスはオーセリオ家の神聖なアーティファクトです。航宙士が{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}を航海するうえで、航路を導くのに役立つのです。このクリスタル…つまりアトラスは…私が覚えている限りずっと私の中にあって、私に力を与えてくれました。ですが他のものは…宮殿にいた反逆者たちは絶望の灰の亡霊に息をつまらせていました。亡霊たちは、間違いなく彼らのアトラスに手を伸ばしていたのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde dieses Geheimnis niemals einem Außenstehenden offenbaren, doch Ihr, {name} ... Ihr seid mir schon mehr als einmal zur Hilfe gekommen." {n}Cassia senkt den Blick und berührt die Platte über ihrem Herzen.{/n} "Der Atlas der Sternenwege ist ein heiliges Artefakt des Hauses Orsellio. Er hilft unseren Navigatoren, einen Kurs durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} zu finden. Dieser Kristall ... Ich meine, der Atlas ... ist in mir, seit ich denken kann, und gibt mir Stärke. Doch die anderen ... Als ich die Abtrünnigen im Palast gesehen habe, wurden sie von aschfahlen Geistern der Verzweiflung gewürgt. Ich schwöre, die Geister haben nach ihren Atlanten gegriffen."
languages.original_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde dieses Geheimnis niemals einem Außenstehenden offenbaren, doch Ihr, {name} ... Ihr seid mir schon mehr als einmal zur Hilfe gekommen." {n}Cassia senkt den Blick und berührt die Platte über ihrem Herzen.{/n} "Der Atlas der Sternenwege ist ein heiliges Artefakt des Hauses Orsellio. Er hilft unseren Navigatoren, einen Kurs durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} zu finden. Dieser Kristall ... Ich meine, der Atlas ... ist in mir, seit ich denken kann, und gibt mir Stärke. Doch die anderen ... Als ich die Abtrünnigen im Palast gesehen habe, wurden sie von aschfahlen Geistern der Verzweiflung gewürgt. Ich schwöre, die Geister haben nach ihren Atlanten gegriffen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Parce que je ne révélerais jamais ce secret à {mf|un inconnu|une inconnue}, {name}... Mais vous, vous m'êtes déjà {mf|venu|venue} en aide plus d'une fois. » {n}Cassia baisse les yeux et pose une main sur la plaque qui couvre son cœur.{/n} « L'Atlas des étoiles est un artefact sacré de la maison Orsellio. Il aide nos navigateurs à déterminer la trajectoire à suivre lors des voyages dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Ce cristal... L'Atlas, je veux dire... D'aussi loin que je me souvienne, il a toujours été en moi et j'en tire de la force. Les autres, cependant... J'ai remarqué que les renégats du palais étaient étouffés par des fantômes cendreux de désespoir quand nous les avons rencontrés. J'aurais juré que ces fantômes cherchaient à s'emparer de leurs Atlas. »
languages.original_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que je ne révélerais jamais ce secret à {mf|un inconnu|une inconnue}, {name}... Mais vous, vous m'êtes déjà {mf|venu|venue} en aide plus d'une fois. » {n}Cassia baisse les yeux et pose une main sur la plaque qui couvre son cœur.{/n} « L'Atlas des étoiles est un artefact sacré de la maison Orsellio. Il aide nos navigateurs à déterminer la trajectoire à suivre lors des voyages dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Ce cristal... L'Atlas, je veux dire... D'aussi loin que je me souvienne, il a toujours été en moi et j'en tire de la force. Les autres, cependant... J'ai remarqué que les renégats du palais étaient étouffés par des fantômes cendreux de désespoir quand nous les avons rencontrés. J'aurais juré que ces fantômes cherchaient à s'emparer de leurs Atlas. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Normalde bu sırrı yabancılara asla anlatmazdım. Sense şimdiden kaç kez yardımıma koştun {name}." {n}Cassia, kirpiklerini indirip elini zırhının üstünde kalbine götürüyor.{/n} "Yıldız Yolu Atlası, Orsellio Hanesi'nin kutsal bir eseridir. Rotacılarımızın {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutta{/g} rota çizmesine yardımcı olur. Bu kristal... Yani Atlas... Kendimi bildim bileli içimde bana kuvvet veriyor. Başkaları ise... Sarayda yüzleştiğimiz hainlere külden olma ümitsizlik hayaletlerinin musallat olduğunu fark etmiştim. O hayaletlerin de kendi Atlaslarına uzandığına yemin edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "I would never reveal this secret to an outsider, but you, {name}... you have come to my aid more than once already." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes and touches the plate over her heart.{/n} "The Starway Atlas is a sacred artefact of House Orsellio. It helps our Navigators chart a course through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. This crystal... I mean, the Atlas... has been inside me for as long as I can remember, giving me strength. But the others... I noticed the renegades in the palace were choked by ashen ghosts of despair when we met face to face. I swear the ghosts were reaching for their Atlases."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sırrı asla yabancılara anlatmazdım ama sen şimdiden kaç kez yardımıma koştun {name}." {n}Cassia kirpiklerini indirip elini zırhının üstünde kalbine götürüyor.{/n} "Yıldız Yolu Atlası, Orsellio Hanesi'nin kutsal bir eseridir. Rotacılarımızın {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}ta rota çizmesine yardımcı olur. Bu kristal... Yani Atlas... Kendimi bildim bileli içimde bana kuvvet veriyor. Başkaları ise... Sarayda yüzleştiğimiz hainlere kül renginde ümitsizlik hayaletlerinin musallat olduğunu fark etmiştim. O hayaletlerin de kendi Atlaslarına uzandığına yemin edebilirim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
